```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
devtools::load_all()
library(tidyverse)
test <- mpg %>%
  select(manufacturer, displ, cyl, cty, hwy) %>%
  filter(manufacturer %in% c("audi", "chevrolet", "dodge", "ford")) %>%
  mutate_at(vars(manufacturer, cyl), as.factor)
```

```{r}
epitable(test, group = "manufacturer", keep.missing = T) %>%
  epitable_to_html(title = "Voici un titre pour le tableau")
```
